Medbay.name: medbay

interactList.name: counter
interactList.description: A medical counter. There's a medkit on the countertop.
interactList.itemDescription: A medkit that can heal the user upon use.

items.name: medkit
items.description: A medkit that can heal the user upon use.

interactList.name: device
interactList.description: A strange medical device. There's an oxygen tank attatched to it
interactList.useDescription: you don't know how to use this.
interactList.itemDescription: An oxygen tank, that can refill the users own oxygen tank.

items.name: oxygen
items.description: An oxygen tank, that can refill the users own oxygen tank.

Medbay.shortDescription: in a medical bay. A flickering light reveals a counter, and a strange medical device in the corner.
Medbay.longDescription:
You are in a medical bay. A flickering light reveals a counter, and a strange medical device in the corner..
There are exits to the  north

Hallway.name: hallway

interactList.name: lockeddoor
interactList.useDescription: The door is locked shut, however you can hear someone inside...

interactList.name: closet
interactList.useDescription: You open the closet, and a bunch of knives slide out. One of them hits your oxygen line.

Hallway.shortDescription: in a hallway, you see a large door to the east, a window on the western wall, and a closet.
Hallway.longDescription:
You are in a hallway, you see a large door to the east, a window on the western wall, and a closet..
There are exits to the  south north

Keyroom.name: keyRoom
Keyroom.shortDescription: in a dimly lit room. In the corner you see a large creature
Keyroom.longDescription:
You are in a dimly lit room. In the corner you see a large creature.
There are exits to the  east south north

item.name: keymodule
item.description: A small electronic device with keymodule printed on it

Communication.name: communicationRoom

interactList.name: panel
interactList.description: A panel with a single lever on it. A label says " door lock"
interactList.useDescription: You pull the lever, and a loud clunk is heard.

interactList.name: radio
interactList.description: A radio array. Maybe you can use this to call for help.
interactList.useDescription: Nothing happens, maybe the empty slot named keymodule has something to do with it

Communication.shortDescription: in the communication room. A noisy radio array is in the middle of the room. There is a panel next to a large door.
Communication.longDescription:
You are in the communication room. A noisy radio array is in the middle of the room. There is a panel next to a large door..
There are exits to the  south west

Armoury.name: armoury

interactList.name: table
interactList.description: A small table. There are a bunch of notes on top

interactList.name: cabinet
interactList.description: A weapon cabinet. There seems to be something inside

interactList.name: bookcase
interactList.description: A bookcase. There are no books left in it.
interactList.useDescription: You move the bookcase to the side, and unveil hole in the wall.

interactList.name: panel
interactList.description: Looks just like all the other panels, but with closer inspection you find a small keypad near the floor. you might be able to find a code somewhere...
interactList.useDescription: The keypad flashes green and the panel slides to the side, opening up a hidden passage

Armoury.shortDescription: in an armoury, you see a weapon cabinet against the eastern wall, a bookcase against the north wall, and a table in the middle of the room.
Armoury.longDescription:
You are in an armoury, you see a weapon cabinet against the eastern wall, a bookcase against the north wall, and a table in the middle of the room..
There are exits to the  west

Airlock.name: airlock

interactList.name: cabinet
interactList.description: A glass cabinet. There is an oxygen tank inside.
interactList.itemDescription: An oxygen tank, that can refill the users own oxygen tank.

items.name: oxygen
items.description: An oxygen tank, that can refill the users own oxygen tank.

interactList.name: switch
interactList.description: A large red switch with a red light beside it.
interactList.useDescription: You press the switch. The light turns red

Airlock.shortDescription: in an airlock. There is an exit hatch in front of you. On the eastern wall is a switch illuminated by a small light, and on the western wall is a small glass cabinet.
Airlock.longDescription:
You are in an airlock. There is an exit hatch in front of you. On the eastern wall is a switch illuminated by a small light, and on the western wall is a small glass cabinet..
There are exits to the  south
